name: Lottoland Earnings Figures Widget
author: Lottoland

sections.description:
This plugin add a widget that view the last earnings figures for a Lotterie. You can select your favorite lotterie and the figures will display in front end.

The earnings figures data is provided for free by lottoland.com. The widget is calling to data from the JSON API of lottoland.com to view always the last data, but caching this with the WordPress Transient API for a time window to create a better performance.

License

Good news, this plugin is free for everyone! Since it’s released under the GPL,
you can use it free of charge on your personal or commercial blog.

Which data

The earnings figures data is provided for free by lottoland.com. The widget is calling to data from the JSON API of lottoland.com to view always the last data, but caching this with the WordPress Transient API for a time window to create a better performance.
sections.installation:
Requirements

  • WordPress 3.8+
  • PHP 5.2*, newer PHP versions will work faster.

Installation

  • Use the installer via back-end of your install or …
  1. Unpack the download-package
  2. Upload the files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. That’s it. The configuring and options are in the usual widget admin interface.

short_description: Display the last earnings figures from lottoland.com on your site.
